title: Requirements Applying to Providers as a Condition to Being Entitled to Payment for Tuberculosis Health Care Services
content:
Requirements Applying to Providers as a Condition to Being Entitled to Payment for Tuberculosis Health Care Services

State Regulations
§ 43-1.4 - Standards for tuberculosis care and services
§ 43-1.5 - Hospital inpatient admissions
§ 43-1.6 - Reporting by providers

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
